response.raw:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
MEMORANDUM

TO: [Client Name]
FROM: [Your Name], Senior Paralegal
DATE: [Current Date]
RE: Document Preparation and Filing System Organization

I. Affidavit Preparation
   A. Gathered relevant facts and information from client interviews and case files
   B. Drafted affidavit using standard legal format
   C. Reviewed affidavit with supervising attorney for accuracy and completeness
   D. Made necessary revisions and prepared final version for client signature

II. Legal Correspondence
    A. Composed formal letters to opposing counsel, court officials, and other relevant parties
    B. Ensured all correspondence adheres to proper legal formatting and includes necessary citations
    C. Maintained copies of all outgoing and incoming correspondence in case file

III. Document Organization and Maintenance
     A. Implemented a comprehensive filing system for both paper and electronic documents
     B. Categorized all case-related materials by date, type, and relevance
     C. Created a detailed index of all documents for easy retrieval
     D. Regularly updated and maintained both physical and digital filing systems

IV. Next Steps
    A. Schedule review of prepared documents with supervising attorney
    B. Obtain necessary signatures and notarizations for affidavits
    C. File documents with appropriate courts or send to relevant parties
    D. Update case management software with new document information

Please review the above actions and let me know if you require any additional information or have any questions regarding the document preparation and filing system organization.
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
